title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated Copilot terminology: Replaced "Copilot Chat" with "GitHub Copilot" and "LLM" with "GitHub Copilot" across documentation.
Clarified CLI instructions: Emphasized escaping backticks in `gh` CLI usage and added MCP as an alternative tool.
Fixed content typos: Corrected "are be formatted" to "are formatted" in support docs.
Improved type safety: Replaced explicit `any` types with proper TypeScript interfaces (e.g., `unknown`, specific error shapes) in multiple files.
Updated LICENSE copyright year from 2025 to 2026.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated Copilot terminology: Replaced "Copilot Chat" with "GitHub Copilot" and "LLM" with "GitHub Copilot" across documentation.
- Clarified CLI instructions: Emphasized escaping backticks in `gh` CLI usage and added MCP as an alternative tool.
- Fixed content typos: Corrected "are be formatted" to "are formatted" in support docs.
- Improved type safety: Replaced explicit `any` types with proper TypeScript interfaces (e.g., `unknown`, specific error shapes) in multiple files.
- Updated LICENSE copyright year from 2025 to 2026.
